title: MVP (South Korean band)
text:
MVP (Korean: 엠브이피) was a South Korean boy band formed by PH Entertainment in 2017. They debuted on March 13, 2017, with Manifest.
On February 16, 2022, Rayoon posted an Instagram post with the caption revealing that the group had disbanded.


== Members ==
Kanghan (강한)
Rayoon (라윤)
Gitaek (기택)
P.K. (피케이)
Jin (진)
Been (빈)
Sion (시온)
